fields.description:
1) In KitchenSink, navigate to Controls -> Slider -> Basic
2) Press 'Change Basic Slider'

Expected results:
Basic slider becomes similar to the custom slider without any intermediate animations/sliders.

Actual results:
There briefly appears a slider similar in size to the basic sliders original size, but with a skull instead of a button.  The slider then becomes longer and the skull moves back into its expected position.

Notes:
For convenience, I uploaded a video of this occurring:
http://vimeo.com/31224414

This is reproducible in 1.7.3 and SDK 1.7.4.v20111025165811

EDIT: Changed to 1.8.0
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink - Changing a basic slider has an intermediate animation

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
